item.description: CONTROLLED Structure Fire; INC#1501; 11:30PM; 213 E 3rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Db2hRt; #DowntownLA; *Corrected Address* Approximately 135 firefighters responded to the three-story abandoned commercial with heavy fire showing. Defensive operations were safe and effective in order to knock down the bulk of the fire. Firefighters quickly extinguished fire that extended to one unit of the neighboring 5-story residential building before it spread any further (with help from a fire sprinkler). Firefighters will be on scene for an extended period of time to uncover and extinguish any smoldering debris within the burned out structure. There was no collapse during the incident, but the building has been red-tagged by Building and Safety and nearby sidewalks are closed to the public as a precaution, as there are signs of compromised structural integrity. It remains unsafe for firefighters to enter and the official "KNOCKDOWN" declaration will likely be tomorrow morning. LAFD RS3 and heavy equipment will aid in the efforts. No injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC2 BC5 CM21 CM722 E1 E10 E11 E12 E14 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E221 E226 E235 E250 E266 E274 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HE1 HR3 PI2 RA1 RA11 RA2 RA25 RA809 RA9 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T2 T20 T21 T26 T3 T35 T50 T66 T74 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 10/26/2022 INC#1501

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1501; 08:20PM; 268 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DKSPWN; #DowntownLA; At least 120 firefighters continue to battle the three-story commercial building. The structure is showing signs of a potential for collapse. Companies have increased their distance, allowing a buffer for a "collapse zone," a continue flowing heavy streams from the exterior. Intense heat exposed a neighboring five-story residential building, where one unit has caught fire. Thankfully, fire sprinklers are holding the fire in check and preventing rapid spread, as firefighters ascend the stairs to address that unit. PIO/Firefighter David Ortiz is on scene.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC2 BC5 CM21 CM722 E1 E10 E11 E12 E14 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E221 E226 E235 E266 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 PI2 RA1 RA11 RA2 RA25 RA809 RA9 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T2 T20 T21 T26 T3 T35 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1501; 07:33PM; 268 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DKSPWN; #DowntownLA; Three-story boarded-up commercial with fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E209 E4 RA809 RA9 SQ21 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 10/26/2022 INC#0278

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0278; 08:45AM; 6261 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3m1G0hq; #NorthHollywood; Over 100 LAFD firefighters battled the blaze at an abandoned restaurant in defensive mode for two hours and five minutes. The building sustained heavy damage during an extended period of fire that weakened the structural integrity, causing a substantial collapse. Approximately eight other small fires in the same area (within the span of approximately an hour) are being investigated alongside this one by LAFD Arson Investigators, however there is currently no evidence connecting these fires. It is still early in the investigation, and Fire Investigators are working closely with LAPD to gather evidence and track all leads. One person of interest has been detained for questioning. Excavators are being brought in to assist with the overhaul of this building and RS3 continues to work on scene in areas that are excessively dangerous for personnel to enter. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 AR10 AR22 AR33 BC10 BC11 BC12 BC14 BC5 CE83 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E261 E27 E278 E288 E289 E298 E35 E39 E60 E76 E77 E86 EA1 EM14 EM18 HE1 HR3 PI1 RA102 RA60 RA827 RA89 RI200 RS3 RT83 T39 T60 T61 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR27 UR88; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0278; 07:15AM; 6261 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DyXyKQ; North Hollywood; Heavy fire continues to burn through the roof of a one-story commercial building. Firefighters are flowing heavy streams through ladder pipes and large hand lines in defensive mode (from the exterior only). The building has sustained partial collapse. RS3 en route. PIO en route. No reported injuries.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC11 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E27 E278 E288 E289 E298 E39 E60 E77 E86 EA1 EM14 EM18 HE1 HR3 RA102 RA60 RA827 RA89 RI200 RS3 T39 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0189; 05:28AM; 10625 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NarXCp; #BroadwayManchester; Firefighters flooded the building with ladder pipes and large hand lines, in defensive mode, keeping the fire from spreading beyond the abandoned neighborhood church building, which contained approximately 3,500 square feet of structures built in the late 1940s. It took 32 firefighters one hour to extinguish the flames, without injury. Per protocol, LAFD Arson Investigators are conducting the investigation on this house of worship fire.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC13 CM722 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 T33 T64; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
